ï»¿RECOMMEND&TION OF STATUTORY COMMITTEE TO: The President, International Development Association Recommendation of the C7mmittee under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement on the proposed .4dditional Financing (Skills Development Support Project) to the Islamic Republic ofMaurita ia The undersigned Committee constitute I under Section 1 (d) of Article V of the Articles of Agreement of International Development Associatior (the Association) hereby submits its recommendation pursuant to said Section in respect of the proposal hat the Association extend to the Islamic Republic of Mauritania an additional grant in an amount equival *nt to SDR 7,400,000. The purpose of said additional grant is to improve the quality and efficiency of t raining institutions by providing additional funds to supplement the financial assistance furnished by the Association under the Financing Agreement (Skills Development Support Project), dated June 13, 2011 between the Islamic Republic of Mauritania and the Association. 1. The Committee has carefully studied the merits of the proposal to extend such an additional financing, and of the purpose to which ihe proceeds of the additional financing are to be applied. 2. The Committee is of the opinion that the project in support of which the proceeds of such additional financing are to be applied continues ti come within the purposes of the Association as set forth in Article I of said Articles of Agreement, and that said project is designed to promote the economic development of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania and is of high developmental priority in the light of the needs of the Islamic Republic of Mauritania. 3. Accordingly, the Committee f inds that said project continues to merit financial assistance from the Association, and hereby recommends,, aid project for such additional assistance.
